page.title: 03FAMILY LIFE IN NEW MALDEN
page.content: AS THIS IS A QUIET AREA IT IS AN IDEAL SPOT FOR THE YOUNGER FAMILY WITH SMALL CHILDREN AND FOR RETIRED COUPLES.THE TYPICAL FAMILY OF THE AREA CONSISTS OF TWO ADULTS AND TWO CHILDREN.FAMILIES TEND TO BE OF THE NUCLEAR TYPE.THE AREA HAS SEVERAL PLAYGROUPS AND SCHOOLS WHICH CATER FOR ALL AGE RANGES. FATHERS ARE THE WAGE EARNERS,SOMETIMES SUPPLEMENTED BY THE MOTHER'S PART-TIME OR FULL-TIME INCOME. FAMILIES ENJOY SPENDING THEIR TIME TOGETHER DURING THE WEEK AND WEEKENDS. MOST FAMILIES TAKE AN ANNUAL HOLIDAY. ON THE WHOLE THE AREA IS AFFLUENT AND LIFE FOR MOST FAMILIES IS COMFORTABLE. THERE ARE FEW OF THE PRESSURES AND PROBLEMS ASSOCIATED WITH UNEMPLOYMENT OR REAL FINANCIAL HARDSHIP.
